abstract: Fears of drowning and balky goggles threatened to ruin a triathlon in Tempe, Ariz, for amateur athlete Laura Arnez; elite triathletes are preparing for the Ironman world championship in Kona, Hawaii.
snippet: Fears of drowning and balky goggles threatened to ruin a triathlon in Tempe, Ariz., for the amateur athlete Laura Arnez.
lead_paragraph: Fears of drowning and balky goggles threatened to ruin a triathlon in Tempe, Ariz., for the amateur athlete Laura Arnez.

headline.main: Racing Against Time and an Indelible Fear
headline.print_headline: Racing Against Time But Also Against Fear
headline.seo: For One Athlete, Ironman Is Race Against Time and Fear
